posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.67 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • This update fixes a bug that prevented link previews from appearing for forwarded messages in some cases.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.66 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.67.0.865-beta

54 new commits since 7.66.0.859-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.67 [1]

  • Use ConcurrentTaskQueue(concurrentLimit: 1) in place of SerialTaskQueue where possible [2]

  • Allow forwarding link previews even when fetching link previews is disabled [3]

  • Fix OWSProgressTest flakes [4]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.54.0 [5]

  • Split BackupAttachmentQueueStatusManager into upload/download variants [6]

  • Do not cancel backup orphaning jobs if the attachment still exists [7]

  • Retry backup attachment downloads as transit tier even if not 404 [8]

  • Allow tx rollbacks on thrown errors in TimeGatedBatch [9]

  • Wait for message processing in backup BGProcessingTask [10]

  • Throw an error if we try to upload a backup on a linked device [11]

  • Clean up BackupArchiveAttachmentByteCounter [12]

  • Allow setting earliestBeginDate for BGProcessingTasks [13]

  • Make Backup list media a durable operation [14]

  • Include whether or not a message was urgent [15]

  • [RFC] Use a read tx for backup export [16]

  • Add Message Backup megaphone [17]

  • Allow cancellation/skip from backup restore confirmation screen [18]

  • Consolidate DB default arguments [19]

  • Add writeWithRollbackIfThrows method to DB [20]

  • Update feature flag check for backups megaphone [21]

  • check feature flag for backup key reminder [22]

  • Rotate BackupPlan-related keys [23]

  • Add and use BackupPlanManager to consolidate side-effects of setting BackupPlan [24]

  • Add support for "resuming" Backup downloads paused-needing-WiFi [25]

  • Support wrapping title/subtitle text in BADownloadProgressView [26]

  • Validate identity when receiving a 422 error [27]

  • Compare GroupIdentifiers without serializing [28]

  • Use GroupIdentifier for requests & related code [29]

  • Use GroupIdentifier when de-duping group refreshes [30]

  • Asyncify getEstimatedFee [31]

  • UX support for Backup subscriptions expired in the past [32]

  • Skip version check for Xcode 26 [33]

  • Add “What to Test” notes for Xcode 26 [34]

  • Add Xcode version to build notifications [35]

  • Use GroupIdentifier in isGroupIdBlocked [36]

  • autofill for backup keys [37]

  • Adapt BackupAttachmentUploadTracker to a non-reentrant AsyncAtomic [38]

  • Hook up manual backup button (basic UX) [39]

  • Remove unused tab bar code [40]

  • Use non-deprecated allowBluetoothHFP value [41]

  • Don’t mark TSMutex withLock blocks as @Sendable [42]

  • Require certain generic parameters to be Sendable [43]

  • Don’t localize SignalSymbol characters [44]

  • Squelch Sendable warnings when calling addCall [45]

  • Use AVFoundation version from Xcode 26 beta 1 [46]

  • Remove trailing AVFoundation version component [47]

  • Dispatch CVLoad in backupProgress update [48]

  • Run upload queue on startup [49]

  • Media tier outer encryption quick fixes [50]

  • Attachment offloading quick fixes [51]

  • Update megaphone backup criteria [52]

  • Update release notes [53]

  • Update translations [54]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.66.0.859-beta…7.67.0.865-beta

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Android to iPad still failing for me:

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.67.0/b75c5203b2de48bcc47d17639af11e710a115bbd538d27710c298b0deca9fe67.zip

Error transferring your messages

Additionally, after relinking I get chat that’s been deleted multiple times from a contact I removed get restored on my chat list and I have to delete it again. Would be interesting if long removed contacts with no chats could finally get removed and purged from my db

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Thanks for reporting – we’ll take a look at the failure. At a high level, it looks like there’s some duplicate data on the Android that’s causing issues on the iPad.

With regards to reappearing contact, some clarifying questions:

  • When you say “removed”, was that by deleting the chat with them or using “Remove” from the long-press action in the “new chat” picker?
  • When they reappear in your chat list, what are the contents in the chat? I’d expect there to be at least one or two info messages.

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Yeah, I removed them from the contacts section of my new chat picker.

When restored it is always an empty chat :(

Contact photos are not syncing to iPad. Is this intended behavior?
https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.66.0/f91e90205c57ebde5cdd8c45d583dca505cdf5b683a1799e558b53187d350748.zip

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Yes, unfortunately for the time being system contact photos don’t sync to iPad. It’s something we’re aware of and would like to improve!

New Version: 7.67.0.871-beta

2 new commits since 7.67.0.865-beta:

  • Wait until call ends to build UI adapter [1]

  • Update translations [2]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.67.0.865-beta…7.67.0.871-beta

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: The linking issue should be resolved in the latest release!

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.68 release.
